page.description: Create a crlf() delimited list of procedure languages for the current SQL syntax.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::ListProcedureLanguages() Syntax List as C = .ListProcedureLanguages() ArgumentDescription ListA CR-LF delimited list of procedure languages for the current SQL syntax. A SQL::Connection object.
Description The ListProcedureLanguages() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of procedure languages for the current SQL syntax. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if ui_msg_box("Procedure Languages", conn.ListProcedureLanguages()) conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
